hero.title: Welcome to Simmons Civil Group Inc
hero.subtitle: Quality Construction Services You Can Trust

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: 10+ Years of Excellence
about.text1: Simmons Civil Group Inc has been providing top-quality construction and utility services for over 10 years. Our commitment to excellence, safety, and client satisfaction sets us apart in the industry!
about.text2: We pride ourselves on building lasting relationships with our clients through reliable service, quality workmanship, and attention to detail on every project.

items.title: Grading
items.description:
-Professional land grading and site preparation services.
-Excavation and earthwork for proper drainage and elevation control.
-Slope stabilization and contour grading to support long-term site stability.

items.title: Water & Sewer
items.description: Complete water and sewer line installation and repair

items.title: Storm Drain
items.description: Storm drainage system design and installation

items.title: Utilities
items.description:
- City water and sewer line  hookups.                                    
- Stormwater drainage systems.                                                                    
- Planned service installs and urgent repair calls.

gallery.title: Our Projects
gallery.subtitle: Take a look at some of our recent work

images.caption: Storm Water Pump Station Rehab. We revitalized the pump station by setting proper grades, installing a new pump and durable wetwell riser, and adding a concrete flare to improve drainage.
